admreg: East Asia and Pacific,East Asia and Pacific

abstracts.cdata!:
The Housing Project will support the
            Government's objectives in the sector by providing
            additional resources to the Government through the National
            Housing Fund (NHF) for low-income housing and will assist
            the Government in formulating a framework for housing policy
            development and an agenda for policy reform in the sector.
            The broad objectives for program and policy reform are to :
            a) better target public housing assistance to the poor in
            terms of the needs of the recipients and minimize the cost
            of providing the assistance; and b) improve regulation of
            the sector in order to increase the efficiency with which
            the market provides housing services to the entire
            population.  Over two years the project will provide : 1)
            support for approximately 15,000 lower-income housing units
            through targeted NHF lending programs; and 2) technical
            assistance and training to build the institutional capacity
            for developing further specific policy and regulatory reforms.
